45.eng-name: Chapters on The Virtues of the Qur'an
45.ara-name: كتاب ثواب القرآن عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Narrated Muhammad bin Ka'b Al-Qurazi:"I heard 'Abdullah bin Mas'ud saying: 'The Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) said: "[Whoever recites a letter] from Allah's Book, then he receives the reward from it, and the reward of ten the like of it. I do not say that Alif Lam Mim is a letter, but Alif is a letter, Lam is a letter and Mim is a letter

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِيمَنْ قَرَأَ حَرْفًا مِنَ الْقُرْآنِ مَا لَهُ مِنَ الأَجْرِ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related Regarding Reciting A Letter Of The Qur'an And The Reward For That
